column1: The dataset has 506  observations and 14 columns.
The 13 features and the target price (last column) are described as follow:
per capita crime rate by town
proportion of residential land zoned for lots over 25,000 sq.ft.
proportion of non-retail business acres per town
River nearby dummy variable (= 1 if tract bounds river; 0 otherwise).
average number of rooms per dwelling
proportion of owner-occupied units built prior to 1940
weighted mean of distances to five Urban employment centres.
index of accessibility to radial highways
1000(Bk - 0.63)^2 where Bk is the proportion of blacks by town
percentage of lower status of the population
median value of owner-occupied homes in $1000s.
